title: What happens after I choose content from the results list?
excerpt: If you see REVEL content that matches your search terms in the results list, a
content:
If you see REVEL content that matches your search terms in the results list, select its icon on the left or title to see a page with an overview, table of contents, and other information.

You can then select the content to add it to your course or enter search terms in the box at the top of the page to look for different content.
